DefaultEvent.Description: Here's something at the back of the hold...
DefaultEvent.Name: What's this?

ChildBranches.Name: Loot and scuttle her
ChildBranches.Description: She's a vile old vessel, and these zees aren't safe. Take what you can and move on.

DefaultEvent.Description: Corsairs! Inventive and disgusting as a sewerful of clockwork apes. You've gleaned enough details to write a treatise, a strategy manual or a titillating penny-dreadful.
DefaultEvent.Name: The study of squalor

ChildBranches.Name: Record any Observations
ChildBranches.Description: If you've gathered enough, you may learn something...

Description: The ship is yours! What will you do with her?
Name: You've destroyed a Pirate Frigate
